text:
Hi Everyone,
Please help me spread this Idea to the world (also please upvote)
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Determine-what-page-a-contact-submitted-the-customer/idi-p/267325#M33829>
This idea is about determining the page where a customer satisfaction survey being submitted
#HubSpot-service #customer-feedback
Hi hi! Two things: How do I load a custom font on my site? 2.) Is there a way to make body text evenly justified?
Hello! You'd usually use an @font-face or @import at the top of your CSS, like this: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/use-custom-fonts-on-blog-posts-or-pages>
You'd also use CSS to justify your text, probably text-align: <https://css-tricks.com/almanac/properties/t/text-align/>

Hey team! I have a Community user looking to build a sidebar and looking for some help: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Filter-Sidebar/m-p/265856>. Any tips, tricks or suggestions for the user would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks!
